response.original_title: Blue's Clues & You!: Caring with Blue
response.overview: In the Blue's Clues & You! Caring with Blue DVD, Blue and her friends play Blue's Clues to learn about all kinds of emotions-Josh is feeling silly, Magenta is so excited to get new glasses and Blue is feeling a bit sad. The DVD will also include special episodes from Josh & Blue's VLOG and eight American Sign Language flash cards featuring Josh and words from the show.
response.title: Blue's Clues & You!: Caring with Blue
